operation.name: execute
operation.description: Run a script with provided code, according to the engine and passing parameters.

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: the script source code to be executed

parameter.name: engine
parameter.description: name of the scripting engine for running this script

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: variables provided to the script as bindings

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable
